title: Will redistricting efforts favor Republicans or Democrats?
shortDescription: The question many are asking is whether 2025’s redistricting efforts are about upholding democracy or diluting representation?

title: Trump revives calls for Chicago crackdown after downtown shooting
shortDescription: President Donald Trump’s comments come days after the Pentagon withdrew some National Guard troops he sent to Chicago.

title: Donald Trump's DOGE is reportedly done after less than a year. What to know.
shortDescription: DOGE is reportedly done, after thousands of federal workers were laid off and the agency reported only a fraction of the savings it promised.

title: Mamdani says he still thinks Trump is a 'fascist' after friendly meeting
shortDescription: New York City Mayor-elect Zohran Mamdani said on "Meet the Press" that he stands by his previous comments on Trump, days after the pair's chummy meeting.

title: World leaders gather after Trump sets deadline for Russia-Ukraine plan
shortDescription: Ukrainian, American and European officials gathered in Geneva on Nov. 23 to discuss a draft plan presented by Washington to end the war in Ukraine.

title: Donald Trump debuts colorful new look
shortDescription: President Donald Trump, now friendly with New York City mayor-elect Zohran Mamdani and fighting with Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene, has a colorful new look.

title: Marjorie Taylor Greene resigns from Congress
shortDescription: Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene announced she will resign from Congress after months of feuds with President Trump and top Republicans.

title: 'Marjorie went BAD': Trump digs at Greene ahead of resignation
shortDescription: Trump says on social media that Greene wouldn't have gotten his endorsement in 2026

title: Trump follows friendly Mamdani meeting with photo spread
shortDescription: Trump posts photos of the two leaders in various places in the White House after friendly meeting

title: Trump said 'quiet piggy' 30 years after calling Miss Universe 'Miss Piggy'
shortDescription: President Donald Trump told reporter Catherine Lucey 'quiet piggy,' nearly 30 years after calling Alicia Machado 'Miss Piggy' for her weight gain.

title: Trump wants to flatten the Education Department. He's getting closer.
shortDescription: The Education Department has inked agreements with four other federal agencies to outsource some of its key functions.

title: US senator's home is target of bomb threat after Trump calls her a traitor
shortDescription: Michigan State Police responded to the threat, which came after Trump criticized Democrats for telling military to disobey unlawful orders.

title: Trump says he is ending deportation protections for Somalis in Minnesota
shortDescription: The president's announcement comes after years of targeting immigrants from the African nation who have resettled in the state.

title: Who is Marjorie Taylor Greene? What to know about the congresswoman
shortDescription: Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene is a third-term Republican who represents Georgia's 14th District.

title: Marjorie Taylor Greene announces resignation after feud with Trump
shortDescription: Greene's resignation from Georgia's 14th Congressional District comes amid a spat with the president over release of the Jeffrey Epstein files.

title: 5 key takeaways from Mamdani-Trump White House bromance
shortDescription: The warm feelings marked a stark contrast after months of fighting in the press and social media.
